message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is my best offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I see you're still looking to save some money, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I need to make a profit, and $10200 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10300 for the product. Can you reconsider?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10400. This is my last concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're making one last concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $10200. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Can you consider $10350?
